Name: brain stem medulloblastoma
Definition: A brain stem cancer that begins in the lower part of the brain on the floor of the skull.

Name: cerebellopontine angle tumor
Definition: A brain stem cancer that is characterized by neoplasms in the fossa located_in cerebellopotine angle.

Name: brain stem glioma
Definition: A brain stem cancer that is characterized by mass lesion of the brainstem

Name: childhood brain stem neoplasm
Definition: A brain stem cancer characterized by mass lesion of the brainstem in childhood

Name: childhood infratentorial neoplasm
Definition: A brain stem cancer in the infratentorial region of the brain in childhood

Name: brain stem angioblastoma
Definition: A brain stem cancer that is characterized by slow growing
